document_data.caption: A map showing the Stait of Oman between Oman and Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Strait of Oman
document_data.mainbody: The '''Strait of Oman''' was a narrow channel of the [[Sea of Moonshae]] that separated the islands of [[Oman's Isle]] and [[Gwynneth]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Geography: The strait measured approximately {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}} from end to end. Several settlements were located along its length. The [[Codsrun Creek]] emptied into the strait at the [[Codsbay]] on Gwynneth's north shore.
